questions.question: Is this a theory only course?
questions.explanation: Combinatoin of both theory and applied concepts; this requires you to attend labs and work through exercises (demonstrate your ability to critically assess, evaluate and problem solve).

options.b: Numeracy and basic OO programming ability (equivalent to 3rd year Computer Science Student)
options.c: Expert in machine learning, programming and mathematics

questions.question: The course is worth 15 credits - how many hours of study/learning time does this require of you over the semester:
